siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Keep records of all your cash flows in multi-platform application, get notified for actions taken on your transactions, mention the debtor/creditor, analyze your transaction history, view detailed reports and one-one reports and optimize your flow of cash.
blogPost.body: Keep records of all your cash flows in multi-platform application, get notified for actions taken on your transactions, mention the debtor/creditor, analyze your transaction history, view detailed reports and one-one reports and optimize your flow of cash.
blogPost.title: IOU-Money - Manage and explore your debit and credit transaction flow
blogPost.author: Nikesh Shakya

localize.description: 在多平台应用中记录您所有的现金流，在您的交易中得到行动通知，提及债务人/债权人，分析您的交易历史，查看详细的报告和一对一的报告，优化您的现金流。
localize.tagline: 管理和探索您的借贷交易流程。

localize.description: 在多平臺應用中記錄您所有的現金流，在您的交易中得到行動通知，提及債務人/債權人，分析您的交易歷史，查看詳細的報告和一對一的報告，優化您的現金流。
localize.tagline: 管理和探索您的借貸交易流程。

previous.excerpt: Library of Diversity is a space for meaningful conversations that connects people across the globe through video-conference to share stories that promote diversity and inclusion.
previous.title: Library of Diversity - A place where books are people and reading is a conversation

localize.description: 多样性图书馆是一个进行有意义对话的空间，通过视频会议将全球各地的人们联系起来，分享促进多样性和包容性的故事。
localize.tagline: 在这里，书是人，阅读是一种对话。

localize.description: 多樣性圖書館是一個進行有意義對話的空間，通過視頻會議將全球各地的人們聯繫起來，分享促進多樣性和包容性的故事。
localize.tagline: 在這裏，書是人，閱讀是一種對話。

next.excerpt: Devcover is an open-source application that allows developers to create and deploy their portfolio in less than 5 minutes with just their username. Features - Good designed - Google Analytics support - SEO friendly - Mobile friendly - Fully customizable - High performance - Availability to be hired - And much more...
next.title: Devcover - Easiest way to generate a developer portfolio

localize.description: Devcover是一个开源的应用程序，它允许开发人员在不到5分钟的时间内，只用他们的用户名来创建和部署他们的投资组合。特点--设计良好--支持谷歌分析--SEO友好--移动友好--完全可定制--高性能--可被雇佣--还有更多... ...
localize.tagline: 生成开发者投资组合的最简单方法

localize.description: Devcover是一個開源的應用程序，它允許開發人員在不到5分鐘的時間內，只用他們的用戶名來創建和部署他們的投資組合。特點--設計良好--支持谷歌分析--SEO友好--移動友好--完全可定製--高性能--可被僱傭--還有更多... ...
localize.tagline: 生成開發者投資組合的最簡單方法
